Title: Sixty years of the great Chinese Communist Party 1921-1981
Notes: Part of a series marking the 60th anniversary of the CCP. Subtitled "Organizing armed workers and peasants to carry out agrarian revolution" (组织工农武装进行土地革命), this first part (of two) covers the "Second Civil Revolutionary War Period 1927-1937" (第二次国内革命战争时期 1927-1937).It shows the failed Nanchang Uprising (南昌起义, 1 August 1927); Zhou Enlai; the failed Guangzhou Uprising (广州起义, 11 December 1927); the Gutian Conference (古田会议, December 1929); Jinggangshan, where the CCP and remnants of various revolutionary armies merged and the first peasant Soviet was set up; and the Long March (1934-1935).
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)Zhou EnlaiJinggangshanThe Long March (1934-1935)
